meanings.definition: The study or interpretation of icons or symbols.
meanings.sent1: In her class, they delved into the world of iconologies to understand ancient symbols.
meanings.sent2: The museum curator specialized in iconologies, deciphering the meanings behind historical icons.
meanings.sent3: The detective's unconventional approach involved using iconologies to solve the mysterious case.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a library of iconologies, each symbol a key to unlocking a different story.
meanings.sent5: The book on iconologies painted a vivid picture of how symbols shape our understanding of the world.

meanings.definition: The symbols or icons used in a particular culture or period.
meanings.sent1: The exhibition showcased the iconologies of the Renaissance era, capturing the essence of that time.
meanings.sent2: Children were fascinated by the colorful iconologies adorning the walls of the ancient temple.
meanings.sent3: The street artist incorporated modern iconologies into his graffiti, creating a unique blend of old and new.
meanings.sent4: Her jewelry collection was a reflection of her love for diverse iconologies from around the world.
meanings.sent5: The movie beautifully portrayed the iconologies of the Mayan civilization, bringing history to life on screen.
